name: stem-mantra-monorepo
description: STEM Mantra - Educational Platform with Next.js Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/node_modules backend/dist node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate

author: STEM Mantra
